item.title: SEEV2X: C-V2X Direct Communication Dataset: An Application-Centric Approach
item.description:
SEE-V2X is a real-world C-V2X dataset, using commercial off-the-shelf standard compliant C-V2X radios, emulating the traffic patterns of popular C-V2X applications."

SEE-V2X Overview

1231231232131

Dataset Description

1231231232131

Example Analysis
